title: Ather Energy, Google collaborate to give real-time information on 2-wheeler fast charging stations
description: Ather Energy has teamed up with Google to offer real-time data on fast charging stations for electric two-wheelers, the company announced Wednesday. Users can locate 'Ather Grid' fast chargers via Google Maps with live status updates. This move aims to encourage the broader adoption of electric vehicles in India, with 1,973 chargers already available nationwide.
